title: 'go build' cannot find packages.
body:
by **calvin.mccutcheon**: 
Environment:
    MacBook-Pro:example example$ pwd
    /Volumes/Data/Users/example
    MacBook-Pro:example example$ echo $GOPATH
    /Volumes/Data/Users/example/golang

Directory contents:
    MacBook-Pro:example example$ ls -alR
    total 0
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  102 Jul 27 19:55 .
    drwxr-xr-x  4 example  admin  204 Jul 27 19:16 ..
    drwxr-xr-x  5 example  admin  170 Jul 27 19:48 golang
    
    ./golang:
    total 0
    drwxr-xr-x  5 example  admin  170 Jul 27 19:48 .
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  102 Jul 27 19:55 ..
    drwxr-xr-x  2 example  admin   68 Jul 27 19:17 bin
    drwxr-xr-x  2 example  admin   68 Jul 27 19:17 pkg
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  102 Jul 27 19:19 src
    
    ./golang/bin:
    total 0
    drwxr-xr-x  2 example  admin   68 Jul 27 19:17 .
    drwxr-xr-x  5 example  admin  170 Jul 27 19:48 ..
    
    ./golang/pkg:
    total 0
    drwxr-xr-x  2 example  admin   68 Jul 27 19:17 .
    drwxr-xr-x  5 example  admin  170 Jul 27 19:48 ..
    
    ./golang/src:
    total 0
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  102 Jul 27 19:19 .
    drwxr-xr-x  5 example  admin  170 Jul 27 19:48 ..
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  102 Jul 27 19:48 example
    
    ./golang/src/example:
    total 0
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  102 Jul 27 19:48 .
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  102 Jul 27 19:19 ..
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  136 Jul 27 19:54 simplecount
    
    ./golang/src/example/simplecount:
    total 8
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  136 Jul 27 19:54 .
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  102 Jul 27 19:48 ..
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  136 Jul 27 19:28 count
    -rw-r--r--  1 example  admin  356 Jul 27 19:54 count.go
    
    ./golang/src/example/simplecount/count:
    total 8
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  136 Jul 27 19:28 .
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  136 Jul 27 19:54 ..
    drwxr-xr-x  2 example  admin  170 Jul 27 19:29 stuff
    -rw-r--r--  1 example  admin   45 Jul 27 19:28 stuff.go
    
    ./golang/src/example/simplecount/count/stuff:
    total 24
    drwxr-xr-x  2 example  admin  170 Jul 27 19:29 .
    drwxr-xr-x  3 example  admin  136 Jul 27 19:28 ..
    -rw-r--r--  1 example  admin   41 Jul 27 19:28 bar.go
    -rw-r--r--  1 example  admin   41 Jul 27 19:29 baz.go
    -rw-r--r--  1 example  admin   41 Jul 27 19:28 foo.go

Source file contents:
    MacBook-Pro:simplecount example$ cat count.go 
    package main
    
    import (
        "fmt"
        "example/simplecount/count/stuff"
        "example/simplecount/count/stuff/foo"
        "example/simplecount/count/stuff/bar"
        "example/simplecount/count/stuff/baz"
    )
    
    func main() {
        fmt.Printf("%d\n", stuff.Stuff())
        fmt.Printf("%d\n", foo.Foo())
        fmt.Printf("%d\n", bar.Bar())
        fmt.Printf("%d\n", baz.Baz())
    }
    MacBook-Pro:count example$ cat stuff.go 
    package stuff
    
    func Stuff() int8 {
        return 1
    }
    MacBook-Pro:stuff example$ cat foo.go 
    package foo
    
    func Foo() int8 {
        return 2
    }
    MacBook-Pro:stuff example$ cat bar.go 
    package bar
    
    func Bar() int8 {
        return 3
    }
    MacBook-Pro:stuff example$ cat baz.go 
    package baz
    
    func Baz() int8 {
        return 4
    }

Result of calling 'go build':
    MacBook-Pro:example example$ cd golang/src/example/simplecount/
    MacBook-Pro:simplecount example$ go build -v -x
    WORK=/var/folders/fv/4ktrdnyn08x9w3xgg2cf88kr0000gn/T/go-build785387510
    count.go:5:5: found packages bar (bar.go) and baz (baz.go) in /Volumes/Data/Users/example/golang/src/example/simplecount/count/stuff
    count.go:7:5: cannot find package "example/simplecount/count/stuff/bar" in any of:
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/example/simplecount/count/stuff/bar (from $GOROOT)
        /Volumes/Data/Users/example/golang/src/example/simplecount/count/stuff/bar (from $GOPATH)
    count.go:8:5: cannot find package "example/simplecount/count/stuff/baz" in any of:
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/example/simplecount/count/stuff/baz (from $GOROOT)
        /Volumes/Data/Users/example/golang/src/example/simplecount/count/stuff/baz (from $GOPATH)
    count.go:6:5: cannot find package "example/simplecount/count/stuff/foo" in any of:
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/example/simplecount/count/stuff/foo (from $GOROOT)
        /Volumes/Data/Users/example/golang/src/example/simplecount/count/stuff/foo (from $GOPATH)

Go version number:
    MacBook-Pro:example example$ go version
    go version go1.1.1 darwin/amd64
